#1

歡迎黎到G-Friend 討論區


Kim So Jeong！Joung Ye Rin！Jung Eun Bi！
Choi Yu Na！Hwang Eun Be！Kim Ye Won！

Yeo！ Ja ！Chin！ Gu！



















GFRIEND（韓語：여자친구）是Source Music於2015年推出的韓國六人女子音樂組合，
成員包括Sowon、Yerin、Eunha、Yuju、SinB和Umji。

2014年10月30日，Source Music公開將於11月推出6人女團。同日，官網介紹4位成員: Sowon、Yerin、SinB、Umji。GFRIEND出道延遲至2015年。
2015年1月5日，Source Music通過官網公布GFRIEND出道日，並公開成員Eunha和Yuju。11日後的1月16日正式出道。粉絲名為Buddy(Buddies)。2017年7月16日第一次舉行香港迷你演唱會。




https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFCjpyA_AdM
170716 GFRIEND 여자친구1st Mini Concert in Hong Kong 香港應援影片


你和我，畢地與女朋友

#2.7

Sports Seoul 對於GFriend成員名稱既解釋
http://www.sportsseoul.com/news/read/270395

藝名意思：

Sowon：
여자친구의 모든 ‘소원’을 이루어라
實現女朋友的所有願望

Yerin：
슬기(睿)로운 이웃(隣)
藝名同本名一樣，睿智的近鄰

Eunha：
‘은하’수의 별처럼 빛나는 소녀
像銀河的星一樣發光的少女

Yuju：
파워풀한 가창력의 소‘유주’
Powerful唱功持有者

Sinb：
mysterious(신비로운) 매력을 가진 신비
擁有神秘魅力的Sinb

Umji：
엄지 척! 여자친구의 마스코트
Thumbs up! (豎起拇指) 女朋友的Mascot (吉祥物)

[Naver] "Super Fast One Month" GFriend September Comeback | MV Filming Finished

Girl group GFriend is preparing for another comeback. It is indeed a quick one.

This August 28, according to several songwriters, GFriend is aiming for a mid-September comeback and currently finished recording a repackage album as well as finished filming the music video.

Past August 1, GFriend released their Fifth Mini-album titled "Parallel". Now, after one month, they are going to release another one for their fans. Last August 27, they held their goodbye stage at SBS Inkigayo thus ending their promotions for the title song Love Whisper.

Through the title song Love Whisper, GFriend has shown outstanding growth in terms of Digital sales, Album sales, Music Show broadcast points, YouTube views and even Global Chart positions which shows their strength as a Trending Girl Group.
